texts.ErrorCodes:Error:000001: The URI must start with http(s)://.
texts.ErrorCodes:Error:000002: The URI must start with https://.
texts.ErrorCodes:Error:000003: An error occurred while connecting to the Elasticsearch server.

texts.ErrorCodes:Error:000006: An error occurred while sending the log to Elasticsearch.
texts.DisplayName:UseSsl: Use SSL while connecting to Elasticsearch server
